resources.string:
RecyclerView is a more advanced and flexible version of ListView.

RecyclerView fills itself with views provided by a layout manager. The standard layout managers are LinearLayoutManager, GridLayoutManager, StaggeredGridLayoutManager, or implement your own.

The views are represented by view holder objects that in charge of display data. View holder objects are managed by an adapter. The adapter creates view holders and binds view holders to their data by calling onBindViewHolder().
Below is a basic recycler view that is displaying a list of items. Select any of the below items to see more on what a recycler view can do.
